version_description:
- Zeeon synth is universal now (iPad + iPhone)
- Added a dedicated MIDI input port
- Additional banks are available as IAP
- Stability improvements and bug fixes

- Zeeon synth is universal now (iPad + iPhone)
- Added a dedicated MIDI input port
- Additional banks are available as IAP
- Stability improvements and bug fixes

• Fixed bug that caused silence when AMP was modulated
• Tools: "Swap layers" works as it should
• MIDI settings are saved in standalone app
• Support for CC02 (breath controller)
• Aftertouch modulation source is smoothed

• Fixed bug that caused silence when AMP was modulated
• Tools: "Swap layers" works as it should
• MIDI settings are saved in standalone app
• Support for CC02 (breath controller)
• Aftertouch modulation source is smoothed

• Redesigned Drive module. Added high-quality wavefolders. 8 distortion types are available now.
• Precise knobs control (left/right movement)
• Drive parameter is smoothed now
• Fixed issues with Cubasis 2.3 (newest update)

• Redesigned Drive module. Added high-quality wavefolders. 8 distortion types are available now.
• Precise knobs control (left/right movement)
• Drive parameter is smoothed now
• Fixed issues with Cubasis 2.3 (newest update)

• BB Synthwave bank available as IAP
• Added Drift option to Delay effect
• Delay length knob works smoothly without crackles
• Improved parameters automation
• Breathe controller range extended (x2)

• BB Synthwave bank available as IAP
• Added Drift option to Delay effect
• Delay length knob works smoothly without crackles
• Improved parameters automation
• Breathe controller range extended (x2)
Fixed: synth interface not showing in stand-alone mode
Fixed: synth interface not showing in stand-alone mode
- Added work-around for an issue with AudioUnit state loading on iOS14
- Added work-around for an issue with AudioUnit state loading on iOS14
